pullRequest.title: Clean up the code coverage configuration
pullRequest.bodyText:
getting rid of some obsolete pieces of configuration
using the jacoco maven plugin to define the surefire arg line instead of preparing it manually

commit.message: Clean up the code coverage configuration

nodes.bodyText: Aren't these src/test classes? Why would they be included in code coverage in the first place?
@rsynek Maybe we can keep this surefire plugin override in the run-code-coverage profile, so we don't need the new jacoco.agent.argLine property in ?
